quest.name: The Nest of Honor
journal: Linu Vali smiles at you warmly, and it looks like she has something to say.

Linu Vali once again expresses her gratitude for everything you have done for her tribe. Her brother also wishes to express his thanks, and looks deep in thought. Speak with him to hear what words his meditative mood has brought to him.

You speak with Linu Vanu, and despite his initial difficulties in figuring out what to say, he finally finds words that adequately express his gratitude. He names you an honored guest of the Gundu, and says you will be welcome with open arms whenever you wish to visit Ok' Gundu Nakki.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Forename, Ok' Gundu Nakki thrives more than ever. To think about the hardships Forename helps us through...

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu Vali knows words are wind, but she thanks you with all her heart! Forename is as sibling born in same nest!

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu Vanu wishes to express thanks to Forename as well. Go to him, he is eager to share his words.

dialogue.name: LINUVALI
dialogue.text: Linu Vanu wishes to thank Forename for guiding Gundu safely through the storm. Go to him, he is eager to speak with you!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, it brings Linu Vanu joy to see you again. For moons does Linu Vanu seek metaphor to express thanks for netherling's actions...

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: But moon sets and sun rises time and again, and still proper words do not come.

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: However, now that Forename stands before me, it is clear!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: A netherling such as Forename is more precious than double─no, triple─rainbow stretching all the way across cloud sea!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: From this day onward, Forename will be welcome in Ok' Gundu Nakki as a most honored guest!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Bloodsworn reputation with the Gundu.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will receive an experience point bonus upon the completion of Vanu Vanu tribal daily quests.
